attributes.action: The stopping of Police officers wearin Help for Heroes, bracelets.
attributes.additional_details:
The Chief Constable of the PSNI is being urged to rethink the right of Police Officers to wear the Help for Heroes Foundation wrist bracelets whilst on duty.

The right to wear such is a mark of respect and a means to develop assistance for our injured forces, I request as a matter of personal choice, that the Home Secretary, apply influence on Chief Constables to allow their personnel Free choice.

rejection.details: Thank you for submitting this e-petition. The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The issue that you have raised is a local one for the Chief Constable.
